summary: Ugh, another dremora race mod? YEP. But do those other dremora mods have glowing scarification? I THINK NOT.
descriptionHtml:
This is inspired by and based on the original [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/eiries-and-honeyvanity/]Abyssal Dremora[/url] by Eiries, Honeyvanity and Halofarm. Check it out if you want other colours!

Features:
Eyes and scars glow in combat
Unique vampire eye variant
Supports male (Sundracon body) and female (UNP body), SFW by default (nudies here)
18+ horn options under under facial hair slider (work with any hairstyle), including "no horn" if you want to use equippable ones
Fangs



Stats:
Stat budget similar to vanilla races. Really high cold resistance balanced by one less skill bonus.
x
x
x
x
Racial: Coldfire

Compatibility
Standalone, will not conflict with anything that modifies the vanilla races
Dawnguard
Better Vampires (see load order notes on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility page[/url])
Hair mods & warpaint mods
Other custom races

Recommended:
Original [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/eiries-and-honeyvanity/]Abyssal Dremora[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?]Better Vampires[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51596/?]Daedra of Coldharbour[/url] (more gorgeous coldfire spells and armor!)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69138/?]Daedric Reaper Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7403/?]Lovely Hairstyles[/url] or other hair mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
Skimpy armor of choice to show off those scars! :B

Known issues/Limitations:
With Racemenu you can use any eyes, but combat glow transition may look odd. Recommend using default all-black eye texture from this mod.


CREDITS:
Eires and Honeyvanity ([url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/eiries-and-honeyvanity/]original abyssal textures/scar workshop[/url])
Halofarm ([url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/mods/skyrim/]original race mod[/url])
icecreamassassin (scripting)
Aipex8 ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69574/?]racial ability FX[/url])
Better Males ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]male body meshes and base textures[/url])
Geonox ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?]high res face maps for men[/url])
Hallgarth ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45407/?]vampire eyes/horns[/url])
leadpoison (female tattoo design)
nouserhere ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20707/?]ear models[/url])
pikkatze ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1971/?]smooth faces[/url])
Th3Mut4nt ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49847/?]horns[/url])
urshi ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145/?]base body textures[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]base head textures[/url]
urshi and VectorPlexus ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]male neckseam fix resources[/url])
volvaga0 ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12788/?]base design for male scarification[/url])
zzjay ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65684/?]seamless UNP meshes[/url], SFW underwear texture)
author: icecreamassassin and Ruse
